text: Nycole Turmel (born September 1, 1942) is a Canadian politician. She was the member of Parliament (MP) for Hull—Aylmer from 2011 to 2015. She is a member of the New Democratic Party (NDP). She was the party's interim leader from 2011 to 2012. ==References== ==Other websites== *Nycole Turmel – Official NDP Constituency Site Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Leaders of the Opposition (Canada) Category:Members of the House of Commons of Canada from Quebec
title: Nycole Turmel
